definition: stone beam/horizontal slab of stone/feldspar or felspar (geology)
dry measure for grain equal to ten dou 斗/ten pecks/one hundred liters
rock/stone/stone inscription/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]
orthoclase KAlSi3O8 (rock-forming mineral, type of feldspar)

sentences.english: It is sometimes used as a substitute for feldspars in the manufacture of glass and ceramics.
sentences.chinese: 在玻璃和陶瓷製造中有時用來作長石的代用品。

sentences.english: But also often acid plagioclase was red meat.
sentences.chinese: 而且酸性斜長石也常呈肉紅色。

sentences.english: King George Island consists mainly of Tertiary volcanics which contain plentiful plagioclases.
sentences.chinese: 喬治王島第三紀火山岩含大量斜長石斑晶。

sentences.english: The morphology of diopside is dendritic and the plagioclase is spherulitic.
sentences.chinese: 透輝石爲枝晶，斜長石爲球粒晶。

sentences.english: The significance of K-feldspar on the supplying and transformation of K was much minor to that of mica.
sentences.chinese: 含鉀長石在鉀素供應及轉化上的意義低於雲母。

sentences.english: In addition, this paper also establishes the internal structure model of labradorite according to the result.
sentences.chinese: 據此建立了暈彩拉長石的內部結構模型。

sentences.english: Albite is a new mineral to Zhejiang province, which was just discovered recently.
sentences.chinese: 鈉長石是我省的一個新發現礦種。

sentences.english: The mechanism of oxygen isotope exchange between alkali feldspar and fluid is mainly dissolution reprecipitation.
sentences.chinese: 鹼性長石流體的氧同位素交換機制主要是溶解再沉澱。

sentences.english: Therefore, the color can not be used as a characteristic marker of potash feldspar.
sentences.chinese: 因此，顏色不能作爲鉀長石鑑定時的特徵性標誌。

sentences.english: Plagioclase widely appear in all kinds of magmatite in.
sentences.chinese: 斜長石廣泛出現在各類岩漿岩中。

sentences.english: The main factors that affect the leaching rate of potassium in potash feldspar were studied.
sentences.chinese: 對熔融氯化鈉浸取鉀長石的提鉀過程進行了研究。

sentences.english: The development of ceramics industry of Anhui promotes the utilization of potassium feldspar resources.
sentences.chinese: 安徽陶瓷工業的發展，提供了開發鉀長石資源的市場。

sentences.english: The mechanism of the potassium feldspar's dissolution and the tobermoriteformation was studied.
sentences.chinese: 研究了鉀長石的分解機理與雪硅鈣石的晶化機理。

sentences.english: The developments in extracting potash from potash feldspar are reviewed in this paper. and the technical difficulties and industrial prospects are discussed briefly.
sentences.chinese: 最後闡述了鉀長石提鉀中存在的問題及發展前景。

sentences.english: There are obvious differences in feldspar content between the north and south sides of the catchment area.
sentences.chinese: 匯水區南北的長石含量存在明顯差異。

sentences.english: This sandstone consists of quartz primarily and feldspar secondly.
sentences.chinese: 這種砂岩的成份以石英爲主，長石次之。
